Bash(gh pr create --base main --head Afrobeats --title "feat: Lighthouse optimizations + YouTube video section + Afrobeat images" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- **Performance**: Critical CSS inline, non-blocking CSS loading, lazy Sentry with requestIdleCallback
- **ClassPageTemplate**: YouTube video section with lazy loading, privacy mode (youtube-nocookie.com), Schema markup
- **Images**: Responsive Afrobeat class images + teacher photos (Charlie Breezy, Redblueh)
- **Security**: Fixed body-parser vulnerability via npm override
- **i18n**: Updated translations for all languages

## Test plan
- [ ] Run `npm run build` - verify production build succeeds
- [ ] Run `npm run test:run` - verify all 58 tests pass
- [ ] Run `npm run lighthouse` - verify no render-blocking resources
- [ ] Check Afrobeat page loads with new images
- [ ] Verify YouTube embed works with lazy loading

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

- Add Twerk landing config
- Fix language selector navigation on all landing pages
- Fix React Hooks order in AlquilerSalasPage
- Add useImageAlt hook for centralized alt text management
- Add image-alt-texts.ts with translations for all locales
- Complete translations for modal keys \(placeholders, consent, submit\)
- Update bundle size limits for new landing translations

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(prerender\): Add complete Hero SSG content for landing pages

Landing pages now have full Hero structure in SSG:
- Header with logo
- Full-screen Hero with background image
- Large H1 title with text shadow
- Description text
- CTA button with animation
- Trust badges \(reviews, CID-UNESCO, students count\)

This fixes the "desconfigurado" Hero issue where only basic
h1/p was shown before React hydration.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

- Add web3forms.com for form submissions

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(csp\): Add all required domains for analytics and tracking

Updated CSP to allow:
- Facebook Pixel \(connect.facebook.net\)
- Vercel Live toolbar \(vercel.live\)
- Google Analytics 4 \(region1.analytics.google.com, *.analytics.google.com\)
- Microsoft Clarity \(*.clarity.ms\)
- Google Fonts \(fonts.googleapis.com, fonts.gstatic.com\)
- Web Workers \(worker-src blob:\)
- Blob URLs for scripts

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(landing\): Remove SSG content to avoid React hydration mismatch

Landing pages now use empty SSG content to prevent React error #418.
The GenericDanceLanding component renders the full content client-side.
Metadata \(title, description, noindex\) is still prerendered for SEO.

Also added vercel.live to frame-src in CSP.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(hydration\): resolve React error #418 on home pages

Empty prerendered content for home pages to avoid hydration mismatch.
The HomePage component has complex dynamic content that cannot be
accurately prerendered, causing React to fail when comparing
server HTML with client render.

- Set home content to empty string for all locales \(es, ca, en, fr\)
- SEO metadata \(title, description, robots\) still prerendered
- React now uses createRoot instead of hydrateRoot for home pages

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
